author: IzaakWN
body:
### PR description

Make `IncludeDY` optional to fix for issues reported for PR #38829, e.g. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38829#issuecomment-1217335165

### PR validation
Checked compilation with `scram`, code checks, code formats, and ran `cmsRun`.

### Backports
Pushed the same fixes to the backports https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38936 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38938.
title: [Fix] Make `IncludeDY` optional
